entry.title: filtering on variable - webi report
entry.content:
Hi all ,

I created a variable on webi report called Rnc_Degraded:(also file attached)

=If (100*([PMNOSYSTEMRABRELEASESPEECH]/([PMNOSYSTEMRABRELEASESPEECH]+[PMNONORMALRABRELEASESPEECH])) >= 1.5*RelativeValue(RunningAverage(100*([PMNOSYSTEMRABRELEASESPEECH]/([PMNOSYSTEMRABRELEASESPEECH]+[PMNONORMALRABRELEASESPEECH]));([RNC]));([Daily]);-1)
Or [PMNOSYSTEMRABRELEASESPEECH] >= 1.2*RunningAverage([PMNOSYSTEMRABRELEASESPEECH];([RNC])))
Then (100*([PMNOSYSTEMRABRELEASESPEECH]/([PMNOSYSTEMRABRELEASESPEECH]+[PMNONORMALRABRELEASESPEECH])) /  RelativeValue(RunningAverage(100*([PMNOSYSTEMRABRELEASESPEECH]/([PMNOSYSTEMRABRELEASESPEECH]+[PMNONORMALRABRELEASESPEECH]));([RNC]));([Daily]);-1))
Else 0

after running the report the variable gets values of number when there is a degradation

or 0 when there is no degradation.

I tried to do filtering of Rnc Degarded >0 on the variable but it changes the table's values.

I attached files of before and after filtering

how can I do a the filtering without changing the table's values?

thanks

entry.title: CRM IST BTX - Extension Contract
entry.content:
Hi Experts,

Our customer needs a SE38 report which is can run extension process for contracts. I got some ways but, i can not finalize report.

The report's goal is after extension process, update PRVO's prices right before creating PRVC. In the report we use 'CRM_ISX_BTX_API_CONT_CHANGE' fm to create PRVO and PRVC. But I need to maintain PRVO before create PRVC. Is there any way achive to this requirement.

Best regards, Utku Y.

entry.title: SAP Telecommunication Org strutucet

entry.title: Swagger for Telco Accelerator
entry.content:
Hello Everyone,

Could you please clarify, why SAP decided the strategy below to webservices versioning ? I mean, each ws version below has specific operations . Why not group all operations in the last API version ?

https://[IP]:[PORT]/b2ctelcowebservices/v1/swagger-ui.html containing:

  • 1.Billing Accounts
  • 2.Subscribed Product
  • 3.Subscription Base

https://[IP]:[PORT]/b2ctelcotmfwebservices/v2/swagger-ui.html containing:

  • 1.ChecklistAction
  • 2.Customer Product Inventory
  • 3.Delivery Mode
  • 4.Geographic Address Management
  • 5.Party Role Management
  • 6.Payment Methods
  • 7.Process Type Management
  • 8.Product
  • 9.Product Catalog Management
  • 10.Product Ordering
  • 11.Recommendation
  • 12.Review
  • 13.ShoppingCart
  • 14.Subscription
  • 15.UsageConsumptionReport
  • 16.productOrder

https://[IP]:[PORT]/b2ctelcotmfwebservices/v3/swagger-ui.html containing

  • 1.Product Catalog Management
  • 2.Product Inventory Management

https://[IP]:[PORT]/agreementtmfwebservices/v1/swagger-ui.html containing

  1. Agreement Specifications
  2. Agreements

https://[IP]:[PORT]/subscribedproducttmfwebservices/v1/swagger-ui.html containing

  1. Subscribed Product

entry.title: Benchmark Spartacus x Adobe Experience Manager (AEM)
entry.content:
Hello everyone,

I've to do some benchmark between Spartacus and AEM , advatanges and disavantages , pros and cons . Could you share some material ? My company already use SAP Commerce Cloud and we've the last SAP Commerce Cloud as well but we use here AEM as front end communicating with Hybris Backoffice . The idea here is to use the full capabilties of SAP Commerce but I need some support to defend this idea . I know that there are several articles comparing the both solutions but maybe there is some best benchmark overview (pros and cons) unifying it better .

Thanks in advance,

entry.title: Prices by Region TELCO SAP Commerce 2105
entry.content:

We have no idea what additional configuration we need. Do we have to assign the region to the user? how does this part really work?

What is the correct configuration that should be done to handle the prices by region?

Regards

entry.title: Unresolveable Circular reference in B2C Telco Services
entry.content:
Hi, We are using SAP Commerce Telco version 2202 along with SAP Commerce version 2105. We are getting below:

Error creating bean with name 'defaultTmaAbstractOrderCompositePriceBuilder' defined in class path resource [b2ctelcoservices-spring.xml]: Cannot resolve reference to bean 'tmaPopBuildersMap' while setting constructor argument; nested exception is org.springframework.beans.factory.BeanCreationException: Error creating bean with name 'defaultTmaPopBuildersMap': Cannot resolve reference to bean 'tmaAbstractOrderCompositePriceBuilder' while setting bean property 'sourceMap' with key [TypedStringValue: value [#{T(de.hybris.platform.b2ctelcoservices.model.TmaCompositeProdOfferPriceModel)._TYPECODE}], target type [null]]; nested exception is org.springframework.beans.factory.BeanCurrentlyInCreationException: Error creating bean with name 'defaultTmaAbstractOrderCompositePriceBuilder': Requested bean is currently in creation: Is there an unresolvable circular reference?

This is OOB code.

Please help resolve this.

entry.title: How to Integrate C4C with Mitel EasyPop?
entry.content:
Hi All,

Mitel is one of the telephony systems that will be used for call centers.

I have attached the screenshot of Mitel easy pop application which will be used to receive a call from a customer.

Expectation

This application will automatically open the browser with the provided URL when a call is received.

Now in our case, when a call arrives we want to launch the C4C Live Activity Centre by providing the URL with the Calling Number as a parameter.

If the number already exists in our system, the account's details need to be displayed.

If anyone worked on this Mitel integration with C4C, please a needful here.

Regards,

Abimanyu G

entry.title: OData is calling twice the request - InboundEmployee
entry.content:
Hi Everyone
I am getting this error in the log, after creating an employee, by postman:
Error: de.hybris.platform.odata2services.odata.RuntimeIOException: An error occurred while processing the request. Please see the log for details.

The strangest thing, that it processes and creates normally, but then in processing the request it gives this exception above, a second call/request.

Why I understand here the OData is calling twice the request:
{{local}}/odata2webservices/InboundEmployee/Employees
There is some config of OData, or it’s a particularity, someone can give me a help.

Thanks.
